name: Witchy Sketchy Alchemy
description:
(Please play in full screen for the WEBGL version. Else just download it)

Every 10 seconds you will transform a bit more into a freaky creature ! You’ll have to brew as fast as possible in order to cure your curse !

Drag and drop ingredients in the cauldron to brew some magic healing potions. But some recipes may have sides effects…

A game of fast observation that rewards the players that can stay calm and fast at same time.
